org.team4159.boths

Class Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream
        • org.team4159.boths.Response
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Response
extends java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream
    The Response class is returned by Views containing the headers and content to be sent back to the client.

    Since this class is a subclass of ByteArrayOutputStream, one may to use this Response as if it were an OutputStream. However, streaming is not supported; all writes to an instance to this class will be cached in memory before being sent to the client.
